attributes.action: give carers a decent income for the work and hours they do
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The amount of money given to carers is abysmally low for the time and effort they put in. It is time the carers allowance is increased inline with inflation, so those on low levels of income can also have a decent standard of living, and not just survive. Carers also need holidays, not just a few hours off now and then, how is that supposed to be funded ?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
